FileHash.description: Used to provide the filename and hash of the SBOM file to be added to the catalog file.

hash.description: The string hash of the SBOM file.

hashAlgorithmName.description: The HashAlgorithmName used to generate the hash of the file.

SignResponseBase.description: The base reponse object for all responses from the signing api.

customerCorrelationId.description: The customer correlation id that is sent to ESRP for correlating the current request to ESRP.

errorInfo.description: If this is an error response, it will have more information about the error.

SignStatusResponse.description: The response returned by the sign status api.

downloadUrl.description: The pre-signed download url used to download the signed catalog file.

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.1.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.1-preview.1' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.
